attributes.action: Bail out the tax payers' family mortgage debit, instead of bailing out banks with tax payers money
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see our government take the ultimate leap in financial history, no not paying the banks or the car giants that have happily taken tax payers money for years, but to pay off, each families mortgage. This is the bail out the country needs, then families would have money to spend in our high streets.

rejection.details:
There are several petitions already in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/stop-melt-down/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
